Company

About Us

Plasmaworks LLC is a small game development studio that was founded in 1995, incorporated in 2009, and is located in Flagstaff, AZ.

Making games is our job and our passion.Â  Our goals are to help define a new sub-genre of hard-core casual titles – games that appeal to core gamers like ourselves but have the accessibility and lower time commitment of casual games – as well as to empower the development community with next-generation game tools and languages.

We currently make games for iPhone, Android, and Palm platforms, as well as the open-source Plasmacore game programming framework for iPad, iPhone, Android, Windows, and Mac.
